content.question: Near the end of the first paragraph, "clumsiness" refers to the

choices.label: confusion caused by failing to give readers fundamental information
displeasure created by reading carelessly crafted writing
boredom resulting from reading stories narrated by unsophisticated speakers

content.answer: confusion caused by failing to give readers fundamental information

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
